metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36976 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: libarchive 3.4.1 through 3.5.1 has a use-after-free in copy_string (called from do_uncompress_block and process_block).

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced by: https://github.com/libarchive/libarchive/commit/47bb8187d3ef2d49ee8c7841cb2872b3cfa1f6f7 this was backported by the upstream-rar-window-mask.patch patch in focal

criterions.comment: libarchive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
